entry.title: OP_CC: A simple introspection opcode to enable cheaper consolidations
entry.summary: The discussion centers on the concept of financially incentivizing address reuse within a certain context, which is deemed an unfeasible strategy. The opinion expressed is quite clear in its skepticism towards the potential adoption of such a policy. The stance taken indicates a firm belief that encouraging address reuse through financial incentives lacks practicality and is unlikely to gain traction or acceptance among relevant stakeholders. This perspective suggests an understanding of the broader implications and possible challenges associated with implementing such a measure, highlighting concerns over its viability and effectiveness.
